comment: The indexed union of a function's values is the union of its image under the index class. This version of ~ funiunfv uses a bound-variable hypothesis in place of a distinct variable condition. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 15-Apr-2013.)
